intro: A wonderful family vacation in Europe.
description:
This wonderful trip will take you through many tourist destinations in various countries. 
You will enjoy visiting famous tourist sites, exploring European musical culture, ancient castles and much more.

This hidden object game is full of new and popular tourist spots. Use your skills and knowledge to play mini-games and find all the hidden objects.

The collector's edition includes:
- play 10 additional locations 
- find even more objects and a funny raccoon!
- play 8 additional new mini-games + 12 more for puzzle lovers
- collect 20 great souvenirs from the trip
